title: His to Keep
description: She’s the future Queen of Veronia.I come from a notorious British family.We’ve been best friends for as long as I can remember…Until one day she broke us.I woke up in Vegas, hungover and married.Betrayed, I left her.Hurt, I stayed away.But then I almost died, and I realized she would always be mine to keep.You may have read part of Tin and Alice's story in Hers to Hold, but this is a revised, reedited, and extended version where you get to meet new characters and learn more about Veronian Christmas traditions, while getting a deeper look into Tin and Alice's love story.
author: Serena Akeroyd
